short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and convert recipes you find on the web into beautiful step-by-step guides ... automatically!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Purée does all the amazing little things to make cooking easier -- such as chopping the directions into steps, highlighting the ingredients you need with each step, and letting you take notes the next time you cook that recipe.

Just click the "Purée It" button when you find a recipe on the web and Purée will save and convert the recipe into a format that's way easier to follow and use than the web recipes you use today.

Stop scrolling and frustrating yourself with recipes that read like old hardcover books. Try Purée today. You'll be amazed!
